job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: This is an exempt level position strong Position Summary strong Were looking for a Machine Learning Engineer to join our Emerging Technology team and work with our team of data scientists to automate the training and evaluation of models within an Azure ecosystem This position will partner with many business product and science teams so written and inperson communication skills are extremely important They must be comfortable working with a wide range of stakeholders and functional teams The right candidate will have a passion for building complete engineering solutions supporting the latest advances in artificial technology We have many different functions in the team and this role requires a broad range of skills such as machine learning data optimization and platforminfrastructure engineering strong Key Responsibilities brstrongulli Study and transform data science prototypes lili Design machine learning systems lili Research and implement appropriate ML algorithms and tools lili Design build and run services at high scale and availability lili Run machine learning tests and experiments lili Train and retrain systems when necessary lili Extend existing ML libraries and frameworks lili Keep abreast of developments in the field lili Demonstrates strong business acumen and understanding of manufacturing and finance concepts lili Adept at quickly acquiring software skills lili Evaluate new AI amp software tools through POCs and propose solutions for implementation lili Document guides systems design reference architectures and implementations liulstrong Job Requirements brstrongulli 5 years of professional industry experience as a ML Engineer Data Scientist or Software Engineer with a focus on building production dataML products lili Demonstrated success across the entire ML lifecycle including feature engineering model development model deployment amp model maintenance lili Demonstratable knowledge of a variety of machine learning techniques clustering decision tree learning artificial neural networks etc and their realworld advantagesdrawbacks lili Demonstrated good working knowledge of cloud computing lili Experience designing developing and shipping web based frontend clients lili Proficiency in web technology stacks UI patterns React JavaScript Typescript lili Good problem solving debugging collaboration and communication skills lili Experience optimizing experiences for performance and accessibility lili Expertise in middle tierbackend technologies such as NET relational andor nonrelational NoSQL databases web services and RESTful concepts lili Understanding of data structures data modeling and software architecture lili Experience with very largescale data processinganalysis aka Big Data lili Experience with Azure cloud services lili Ability to work independently to actively identify and drive solutions for evolving business problems lili Deep knowledge of math probability statistics and algorithms lili Ability to write robust code in Python and R lili Strong business aptitude the ability to rapidly learn new problem domains and become conversant in the domain with subject matter experts lili A drive to learn and master new technologies and techniques lili Creative proactive bold and outofbox thinking brliulstronguEducational Requirementsbrustrongulli MS or PhD in Engineering Statistics Applied Mathematics Computer Science or other technical discipline liul Relocation assistance may be available with this positionbrbrThis position offers a complete benefit package including 401KESOP pension health life vision and dental insurancebrbrADM requires the successful completion of a preemployment drug screen and a background
